content: --प्रसंग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} talkative, talking much and foolishly. {2} mad, foolish. (--गः {1} conversation, talk or course of conversation; नानाकथाप्रसंगावस्थितः <ls>H. 1</ls>; कथाप्रसंगेन विवादं किल चक्रतुः <ls>Ks. 22. 181</ls>; <ls>N. 1. 35.</ls> {2} a curer of poisons (विषवैद्य); कथाप्रसंगेन जनैरुदाहृतात् <ls>Ki. 1. 24</ls> (where the word is used in sense 1 also).
